error.signature: cannot use X (variable of type T1) as type T2 in argument

verdict.summary: Type mismatch in function argument or assignment. Go has no implicit conversions.

dead_ends.action: Use unsafe.Pointer to cast between types
dead_ends.why_fails: Extremely dangerous, undefined behavior for non-pointer types
Aliases don't help with interface satisfaction or conversion

workarounds.action: Implement the required interface on your type

preceded_by.condition: Fixed undefined by using value from different package with incompatible type

frequently_confused_with.distinction: TS2322 is TypeScript type assignability; Go cannot-use-as-type is Go's compile-time type checking
Rust E0308 is similar concept but in Rust's type system
